entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 23.

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:06 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
